divs: Sighting Detailsi was walking in busch gardens heading towards rides and all.and how i notice it was i was looking at the sky in front of me and i saw a fireball slowly hovering i stared at it for a good 10 secs or less.i knew it was a fireball as soon as i saw it. it was hovering slowly didnt turn at all just kept moving slanted away from me.i was amazed and shocked i allways wanted to see a ufo and that day i did and when it was gone i looked away like noting happen but i felt amazed.i lost sight of the fireball when it went behind a tree well a few trees.
Summary: fireball moving slowly at busch gardens it was kinda big but i was pretty far from the fireball.
